attributes.action: Showing Andrew Turner that the isle of wight is for gay marriage, not against.
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Mr Turner,
		Here is a list of people who believe that your decision to vote against legalisation of gay marriage is homophobic, discriminatory, wrong and simply stuck in the stone age.
There is no realistic basis for voting against it as civil partnership has been legal for years and there have been no issues, just accept that your prejudices are just that, prejudice and that you are scared of the change.

You have shown your true and frankly, quite disgusting colours.
